snippet.title: Base One - Reveal Trailer - Coming to PC and consoles in Q2 2021!
snippet.description:
🎮  Base One is coming to Steam and GOG for PC, as well as PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4 in Q2 2021! 🎮

- Wishlist it on Steam ► http://bit.ly/BaseOneSteam

Base One is a space station simulator with hardcore survival and RPG mechanics.

Step into the role of intrepid explorers seeking to build new homes across the far reaches of the
cosmos. Establish new colonies by building space stations, managing vital needs like heat,
oxygen, and power, while searching for valuable resources in uncharted wilds.

---

FOLLOW US ON

Find out more ► http://bit.ly/BaseOneLinks

Blowfish Studios Twitter ► http://bit.ly/2PkYmHq
Blowfish Studios Facebook ► http://bit.ly/2LGKwNr
Blowfish Studios Instagram ► http://bit.ly/2MDhRxW
